description.value: A devourer, sent by Orcus with a hunger for souls, often imprisons victims in it's chest cavity as it slowly tortures the creatures soul. Using a gem, a harvester may be able to collect a collect a trace amount of the souls essence, creating a soul shard. A soul shard is highly valued in the magic community. A soul shard is a valuable currency in the Nine Hells. While not as valuable as a full soul, in the Nine Hells a soul shard is worth 10x value of the gem it is embedded in (but less valuable on the material plane). Use: A magic user can use a soul shard as a magic focus. In addition, the soul shard can be shattered (if a hard surface is available), causing 2d6 damage to every creature in a 30ft radius, including the caster.
